channel.title: CVE Feed for D-Link -- Multiple Routers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for D-Link -- Multiple Routers

item.title: CVE-2020-8864|2024-08-04T10:12:10.983Z -- d-link -- multiple%20routers
item.description: This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of D-Link DIR-867, DIR-878, and DIR-882 routers with firmware 1.10B04. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the handling of HNAP login requests. The issue results from the lack of proper handling of empty passwords. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the router. Was ZDI-CAN-9471.

item.title: CVE-2020-8863|2024-08-04T10:12:10.996Z -- d-link -- multiple%20routers
item.description: This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of D-Link DIR-867, DIR-878, and DIR-882 routers with firmware 1.10B04. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the handling of HNAP login requests. The issue results from the lack of proper implementation of the authentication algorithm. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute code in the context of the router. Was ZDI-CAN-9470.
